Gatin，（adj.=gatika） 1．going，i．e．having a certain course：sabbā nadī vaṅkagatī “every river flows crooked” J.I，289．-- 2．having a certain gati，fated，destined，esp．in su° & dug°：samparāye suggatī going to a happy existence after death Vin.II，162=J.I，219； saggaṁ sugatino yanti “those who have a happy fate （because of leading a good life） go to one of the Heavens” Dh.126．（Page 243）
